Class MoveGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • MoveGen

  • public class MoveGen
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class contains routines to generate all possible legal moves given a board state
    Author:
    ranuva 8 A8 H8 7 6 . 5 . . 4 . . . 3 A3 . . 2 A2 B2 . 1 A1 B1 ... H1 A B C D E F G H Info: 1.Top left corner is LSB of 64 bit number. 2.Bottom right corner is MSB of 64 bit number. Vertical Columns are called Files. Eg: File A etc. Horizontal Rows are called Ranks Eg: Rank 4 etc.

      This method is used to generate all the possible white moves from the given bit board given configuration Each move is encoded as follows.

    • Method Detail

      • getPossibleWhiteMoves

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPossibleWhiteMoves(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> priorMoves,
                                                                           long WP,
                                                                           long WR,
                                                                           long WN,
                                                                           long WB,
                                                                           long WQ,
                                                                           long WK,
                                                                           long BP,
                                                                           long BR,
                                                                           long BN,
                                                                           long BB,
                                                                           long BQ,
                                                                           long BK)
        This method is used to generate all the possible white moves from the given bit board given configuration Each move is encoded as follows.
        byte meaning example
        ====================================
        1 from- 36 (A5)
        2 to-square 49 (B6)
        3 flags xx (en-passant capture or pawn promotion or castles or double pawn push)
        4 captured-piece xx (black pawn)
        Parameters:
        priorMoves - Array List of integers representing previous moves
        WP - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the White Pawns
        WR - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the White Rooks
        WN - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the White Knights
        WB - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the White Bishops
        WQ - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the White Queens
        WK - Bit Board Representation of the position of the White King
        BP - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the Black Pawns
        BR - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the Black Rooks
        BN - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the Black Knights
        BB - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the Black Bishops
        BQ - Bit Board Representation of the positions of the Black Queen
        BK - Bit Board Representation of the position of the Black King
        Returns:
        Array List of integers; Each integer(4 Bytes) represents a move.
